text: Hello
hi
How are you?
Good, thanks, how about you?
I'm doing great, thanks.
Let's talk about a children's charity.
Okay, sounds good.
Do you know of any children's charity?
Yes, I know a really great children's charity called Save the Children.
Sounds good. Tell me more please
It is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
That sounds excellent. Do you have their website link?
Yes, I do! It's  URL
Awesome. I would really like to support them and donate to them.
That's awesome! You're a good person!
How can I send in a donation?
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
Oh, I didn't realize it would be deducted from my task payment. Can I get a receipt for tax purposes?
Yes, donations to Save the Children are 100% tax deductible.
That's good. I have decided on an amount for my donation. That will be $0.
Is there a reason why you wouldn't like to donate? Maybe I can answer some more questions for you.
